DoorcodeInfoTitle: Your door code is your key in Nelson hotel
DoorcodeInfoDesc: All guests will receive their door code by SMS and email close to the date of arrival.
SuiteRoomDescription: A spacious two-room apartment with a sauna where you are guaranteed to sleep well. Suitable for e.g. families. A large bathroom, a separate toilet and a private bedroom and a kitchenette makes your stay comfortable even for a longer period. Spare beds for two people. Rooms available for 1-4 people.
StandardRoomDescription: Enjoy a good night's sleep in our comfortable beds. A spacious bathroom and a small refrigerator ensures your comfort. Rooms available for 1-4 people.
SingleRoomDescription: Comfortable and well-equipped single room with your own bathroom.

breakfast.MH1: A nearby restaurant serves breakfast to hotel guests at 244 W 55th St, New York.

suite.mh1-1: Spacious room with beautifully designed layout.
suite.mh1-5: Double bed, office desk and TV.

single.mh1_sgl_bed: This room has a high-quality single bed.
